attributes.action: Make Dr Shaun Donnelly (free science lessons guy) the UK Minister of Education.
attributes.background: Dr Shaun Donnelly has done more to educate the future generations of Britain than any minister of education. He has improved the grades of hundreds of thousand of grateful teenagers. He is more qualified to be the minister of education than anyone in government now.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments. That includes calling for someone to be given a job.
